| HistoryText             = The Rivals is a gang that operated in the [[Harlem]], [[New York]]. [[Luke Cage (Earth-616)|Luke Cage]] (born Carl Lucas) spent his childhood in the gang along with his friend Willis Stryker. Lucas engaged in many gang fights with The Diablos, a rival gang. He also committed petty crimes and worked for a crime lord named [[Sonny Caputo (Earth-616)|Sonny Caputo]]. The gang's other member included [[Comanche (Earth-616)|Comanche]] and [[Shades (Earth-616)|Shades]].{{r|Hero for Hire #1}}

Later the name of [[Tilda Johnson (Earth-616)|Nightshade]]'s organization, with [[Cornell Stokes (Earth-616)|Cottonmouth]] and the [[Flashmob (Earth-616)|Flashmob]] as members.{{r|Shadowland: Power Man #2}}
